title: Blonde woman posts intimate images to Instagram of her ex-partner's new girlfriend
text:
A former sex shop worker created a fake Instagram account to post revealing images of her ex-partner's new girlfriend.

Jennifer Gander pretended to be her former employer, a Sydney sex store, when she posted the the graphic images, some of which showed the victims face.

One image showing the woman's breasts was captioned: 'happy customer'.

Jennifer Gander pretended to be her former employer, a Sydney sex store, when she posted the the graphic images, some of which showed the victims face

The 44-year-old also sent the woman threatening messages.

'You are disgusting, sneaky, rude, disrespectful and just pathetic … enjoy your sex toys they will be the last gift you ever get,' one message read.

Gander's ex-partner eventually stormed the sex store where Gander used to work and demanded to know why images of his girlfriend were being used on their Instagram page.

The sales director then explained to him the account was fake, The Daily Telegraph reported.

However, Gander continued to torment the woman up until her arrest.

'I refuse to see police because of you … you are nothing but (sic) skank and slut,' she messaged the victim.

The 44-year-old also sent the woman threatening messages. 'You are disgusting, sneaky, rude, disrespectful and just pathetic … enjoy your sex toys they will be the last gift you ever get,' one message read

'No police will take away who you really are … you are just a f*** tart and a loser.'

Gander pleaded guilty to a slew of charges, including using a carriage service to menace or harass, intimidation and distributing intimate images, in the Sutherland Local Court this week.

She will be sentenced in November.
description: Jennifer Gander, 44, created the fake social media page pretending to be her former employer, a Sydney sex store, and captioned the graphic images: 'happy customer'.
authors: Kelsey Wilkie For Daily Mail Australia
